item.title: Dynamics 365 Fundamentals
item.description: My last Microsoft exam was when I obtained my MCSE + Internet; this was over 20 years ago. So, things have changed a lot! Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365 Fundamentals The first exam that I decided to pursue was Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365 Fundamentals. The Learning Path that is provided in the link above is a great way to prepare for the exam. Microsoft has been building out the Microsoft Learn system, this should be the primary source of content as this is directly from Microsoft.
